Author: tolken#2655
Content: Lots of cool things brewing in Kmd land, AtomicDEX is the most tangible thing that anyone can use and experience the wow factor. All of the CryptoConditions stuff was generating a lot of buzz and there was that dungeon game.... then k64 entered the scene and for me at least sort of gave the impression it was the next iteration of ‚Äúblockchain enforced‚Äù gaming, but of course that‚Äôs a mess at the moment. When we see a game or something highly interactive on the blockchain, like some sort of game (maybe even the duneon one, but with a web interface, with the same ease of use as AtomicDex, I‚Äôd imagine Kmd  will get a lot of attention.

Author: tolken#2655
Content: @PTYX easier said than done, but when asked what sets AtomicDex apart, doesn‚Äôt seem like there was a clear answer other than Komodo has been doing it for a long time. Key points id reiterate - no KYC required, supports Eth, erc-20, most bitcoin protocol coins etc. Kadan knows this of course and I‚Äôve heard him articulate this clearly before, but sometimes hard to think on your toes I guess üòÉ need to nail down those talking points, that‚Äôs a softball waiting to be hit out of the park.

Author: polycryptoblog#1173
Content: @tolken  what sets it apart currently :  Worlds only mobile cross chain atomic swap Dex .  Liquidity Multiplier to get more out of trading.   Future:  multi-ecosystem pegged coins ,  Selective trading filters,  private trading layer ( via pirate )

Author: polycryptoblog#1173
Content: The multi ecosystem pegged coins and private trading layer will be hard for competitors to replicate

Author: tolken#2655
Content: True more great points. Let‚Äôs make up some flash cards for his next interview üòõ mm2 and AtomicDex, when people see how well it works, i think it has a serious chance of making a dent where others have failed.  I am concerned about the dex-cex liquidity solutions. They‚Äôre definitely something we need to take advantage of, but ultimately regulators will make it illegal. That said, it may just be a bit of a race. Once there‚Äôs sufficient dex liquidity, the cex interface /liquidity won‚Äôt be as necessary if at all.
